bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.note: The 'rizk' was an Arab continuation of the Byzantine annona militaris as well as equal to it in amount.
bibl.seg: El Abbadi Mostafa, 'Annona militaris' and 'Rizk' of Nessana.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 1057-1062.
The 'rizk' was an Arab continuation of the Byzantine annona militaris as well as equal to it in amount.
